headline: Veralto Schedules Fourth Quarter 2024 Earnings Call
summary: Veralto Corporation (NYSE: VLTO), a global leader in essential water and product quality solutions dedicated to Safeguarding the World's Most Vital Resources™, announced that it will webcast its fourth quarter 2024 earnings conference call on Wednesday, February 5, 2025, beginning at 8:30 a.m. ET.
